thread.title: Here are the best things you can buy at Patagonia's winter sale
thread.title_full: Here are the best things you can buy at Patagonia's winter sale - Business Insider

author: Tyler Lauletta
title: Here are the best things you can buy at Patagonia's winter sale

organizations.name: patagonia men's reversible bivy down vest

text:
The Insider Picks team writes about stuff we think you'll like. Business Insider has affiliate partnerships, so we get a share of the revenue from your purchase.
Patagonia Instagram
There's another big sale going on at Patagonia !
Now through January 31, you can get 30% off tons of durable winter jackets, fleeces pullovers, down vests, and much more.
Known both for its consistent quality and commitment to sustainability , Patagonia is a great shopping destination for anyone looking to properly outfit themself for the elements this winter, and beyond.
You can take a look at our favorite picks below to see what you might want to add to your closet, or check out everything Patagonia has to offer on sale here .
View As: One Page Slides Men's Wanaka Down Jacket Patagonia With a two-layer shell, full hood, and Traceable Down insulation, this jacket will keep you warm all winter.
Patagonia Men's Wanaka Down Jacket, $279 (originally $399)
Women's Bivy Down Jacket Patagonia Insulated with 100% recycled down, you can rest assured your jacket is both affordable and sustainable.
Patagonia Women's Bivy Down Jacket, $174 (originally $249)
Men's Reversible Bivy Down Vest Patagonia A great addition to your wardrobe ahead of the spring season, as well as an easy way to layer if you’re planning on hitting the slopes a few more times this year.
Patagonia Men's Reversible Bivy Down Vest, $132 (originally $189)
Women's Down Sweater Vest Patagonia Just as with the men’s vest, this works both as a piece of spring outerwear or a layer to insulate you underneath a more burly outer coat.
Patagonia Women's Down Sweater Vest, $125 (originally $179)
Men's Better Sweater 1/4-Zip Fleece Patagonia The quarter-zip fleece is the perfect piece of in-between weather attire.
Patagonia Men's Better Sweater 1/4-Zip Fleece, $69 (originally $99)
Women's Re-Tool Snap-T® Fleece Pullover Patagonia Whether you’re warming up by the fire or taking your dog for a walk on a cool spring day, you can do no wrong wearing a Patagonia fleece.
Patagonia Women's Re-Tool Snap-T Fleece Pullover, $83 (originally $119)
Refugio Backpack 28L Patagonia If you’re the outdoors type, chances are you need a backpack that can handle any situation.
Patagonia Refugio Backpack 28L, $62 (originally $89)
Arbor Duffel Bag 30L Patagonia Whether you have a weekend camping trip coming up or need to get ready for a road trip to the beach, a simple bag like this one will meet all your needs with little hassle.
Patagonia Arbor Duffel Bag 30L, $55 (originally $79)

This does not drive our decision as to whether or not a product is featured or recommended. We operate independently from our advertising sales team. We welcome your feedback.
